response.overview: Bone Thugs-N-Harmony captured the ears of a large audience through a very novel idea--a hardcore rap group who can sing like angels. This program features exclusive footage of the band given to them over the years by fans. Bone Thugs-N-Harmony - Live & Uncut video Containing rare moments from tours, television performances, and awards shows, this program features the best of Bone Thugs-n-Harmony.
response.title: Bone Thugs-N-Harmony - Live & Uncut
